mapper.select: SELECT chall_no, chall_title, chall_content, chall_startat, chall_closeat, chall_state, main_img, detail_img, chall_score, view_count, chall_createat, chall_updateat, user_no, user_count FROM ( SELECT c.chall_no, c.chall_title, c.chall_content, c.chall_startat, c.chall_closeat, c.chall_state, c.main_img, c.detail_img, c.chall_score, c.view_count, c.chall_createat, c.chall_updateat, c.user_no, count(e.user_no) AS user_count FROM chall c join chall_enter e on c.chall_no = e.chall_no WHERE chall_state='D3' GROUP BY c.chall_no, c.chall_title, c.chall_content, c.chall_startat, c.chall_closeat, c.chall_state, c.main_img, c.detail_img, c.chall_score, c.view_count, c.chall_createat, c.chall_updateat, c.chall_no, c.user_no order by 14 desc ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6

SELECT chall_no, chall_title, chall_content, chall_startat, chall_closeat, chall_state, main_img, detail_img, chall_score, view_count, chall_createat, chall_updateat, user_no, user_count FROM ( SELECT c.chall_no, c.chall_title, c.chall_content, c.chall_startat, c.chall_closeat, c.chall_state, c.main_img, c.detail_img, c.chall_score, c.view_count, c.chall_createat, c.chall_updateat, c.user_no, count(e.user_no) AS user_count FROM chall c JOIN chall_enter e ON c.chall_no = e.chall_no WHERE chall_state = 'D2' GROUP BY c.chall_no, c.chall_title, c.chall_content, c.chall_startat, c.chall_closeat, c.chall_state, c.main_img, c.detail_img, c.chall_score, c.view_count, c.chall_createat, c.chall_updateat, c.chall_no, c.user_no ORDER BY count(e.user_no) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT chall_no, chall_title, chall_content, chall_startat, chall_closeat, chall_state, main_img, detail_img, chall_score, view_count, chall_createat, chall_updateat, user_no, user_count, d_day FROM ( SELECT c.chall_no, c.chall_title, c.chall_content, c.chall_startat, c.chall_closeat, c.chall_state, c.main_img, c.detail_img, c.chall_score, c.view_count, c.chall_createat, c.chall_updateat, c.user_no, count(e.user_no) AS user_count, to_date(c.chall_closeat,'yyyy-MM-dd') - to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS d_day FROM chall c JOIN chall_enter e ON c.chall_no = e.chall_no WHERE chall_state = 'D2' GROUP BY c.chall_no, c.chall_title, c.chall_content, c.chall_startat, c.chall_closeat, c.chall_state, c.main_img, c.detail_img, c.chall_score, c.view_count, c.chall_createat, c.chall_updateat, c.chall_no, c.user_no, to_date(c.chall_closeat,'yyyy-MM-dd') - to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ORDER BY user_count DESC, d_day asc ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6
